name: Santa's Sleigh
description:
A simple, fast paced running game based on Santa Claus.  Jump from roof to roof, deliver presents, and gobble up goodies to get the highest score!

Controls

Use your mouse or the space key to make Santa jump.  The longer you hold it, the higher you'll go!

If you have issues running it, email me at cardanis.studios@gmail.com so I can help resolve the problem!
